author: freep.com
title: Detroit Red Wings vs. Carolina Hurricanes: Game info, time, TV, etc.
text:
MORE Detroit Red Wings (3-0-0) vs. Carolina Hurricanes (0-3-0)
Where: Joe Louis Arena.
When: 7:30 p.m.
TV/radio: FSD, WXYT-FM (97.1).
The skinny: This is already the second matchup between these two, with the Red Wings winning on Saturday, 4-3. ... Johan Franzen, who's been plagued with head injuries over the last year, is suffering from concussion-like and is out indefinitely . ... Henrik Zetterberg, who scored the eventual game-winner in Tuesday's win over the Lightning , leads the Wings with seven points. One would assume it's Petr Mrazek's turn in goal. He stopped 44 shots in the win over the Carolina in Raleigh.
